DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety and efficacy of the combination cisplatin plus irinotecan in the treatment of biliary tract cancer.
DOC.brief_title: GAMBIT Trial: Cisplatin Plus Irinotecan in the Treatment of Gallbladder or Biliary Tract Cancer
